attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Harry Patch is now 111 years old. He will not survive that much longer. He is the last Tommy from World War 1. 
He has been honoured by the Belgians and the French. 
Why not by Britain? 
I call on the Prime Minister to do the right thing and bestow the highest of honours on this dear man NOW. 
Before it is too late.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
